title: Wear Disco
summary: Look cool at night and turn your Android Wear into a disco system!
description: Want to look cool at night and let the world you know you have an Android Wear device?The Wear Disco Android Wear app allows you to use your wearable as a mini disco system by keeping wearable screen on and showing HUNDREDS of random colours.Stand out from the crowd Looks cool at night.Disco bouncing ballAs you move you're wrist, the bouncing ball moves and as the ball hits the edges, the colour of the ball and background colour change randomly.Control speedThis Android Wearable app allows you to control the speed of the colours being displayed on the wearable screen via long pressing the screen to access settings.Flashlight Has a standard flashlight setting.Future releaseMore settings, colours, patterns and customisations to be released. (The above wearable app is also on the handheld device for convenience, and works the same way)
descriptionHTML:
Want to look cool at night and let the world you know you have an Android Wear device?

The Wear Disco Android Wear app allows you to use your wearable as a mini disco system by keeping wearable screen on and showing HUNDREDS of random colours.

Stand out from the crowd
Looks cool at night.

Disco bouncing ball
As you move you're wrist, the bouncing ball moves and as the ball hits the edges, the colour of the ball and background colour change randomly.

Control speed
This Android Wearable app allows you to control the speed of the colours being displayed on the wearable screen via long pressing the screen to access settings.

Flashlight
Has a standard flashlight setting.

Future release
More settings, colours, patterns and customisations to be released.

(The above wearable app is also on the handheld device for convenience, and works the same way)
comments: Ok It's ok I like lights lol
Battery drainer Moto 360, colorful but not really useful.
Moto 360 Does'nt work very well with the moto 360. When using the display rotates 90 degrees. I can not change any setting (speed etc.)

Rotated 90Â° on moto360 Works just fine, but rotates the watch when used on moto360, which causes ur swipe gestures to exit the app to rotate as well, the menu is rotated too....3 stars till fixed then 5

lovely... on the phone: 1-make it fullscreen ie hide both statusbar and titlebar(actionbar).2-brightness adjustment. 3-ball size adjustment. 4-permanent bouncing 5-option for solid color for either ball or environment... thanx.
